1.content:
It was a normal day for you. You had just gotten home after playing with Andrew and noticed that the TV was left on. "Ugh... Selena left her dumb pony show on... I guess I can watch something else." You flipped through the channels, not wanting to spend a second on your sister's girly cartoon.

Just as you had sat down and gotten comfortable, Selena came in with her dumb cat in her arms, dropping him on his feet as she saw you. "Hey!" Your sister ran over to you stomped on the ground. "I was watching that! Turn it back or I'm telling Mommy!"

"You know the rules, Selena!", you responded. "If you're not in the room, you don't get to complain if the channel's changed."

"Change it back!"

"NO!"

Your little sister stared up at you with a scowl until her eyes started watering and she took a deep breath. "MOOOOMMMYYYYY!"

Trish soon ran into the room to see her daughter standing there crying while her son was sitting on the couch. "Jack! What did you do?!"

"I didn't do anything!", you insisted. "She's just mad cus she left the room with her dumb shows on! You're the one that made the rule!" You were really upset. Your sister always did this. Any time she didn't get her way, she'd cry and throw a fit until your mom intervened, and usually at your expense.

She was sobbing as she picked up her kitty up off of the ground. "I... I went... to go feed Ian... and- and- Jack took the remote, and I didn't get to watch all day!"

Trish sighed and knelt down to both of your levels. "Jack, could you please be a good big brother and share with your sister?"

You pouted a bit, thinking that you should hold your ground, but you sighed as you realized that Selena probably wouldn't stop throwing a fit until you gave it up. "Fine." You slid off of the couch and handed the remote to your sister. "Here you go... little brat..."
Selena's crocodile tears quickly vanished as she stuck her tongue out at you.

Trish suddenly pulled out her phone and read through a text message. "Kids, I have to go meet up with Aunt Vivian and your cousins", your mom said a she quickly grabbed her purse. "Miss Barbara is right next door if you need anything. Please be nice to each other while I'm gone."

"I'll try", you responded.

"Yes, mommy", she said as if she wasn't crying her eyes out just a minute earlier.
As she left and locked the door behind her, you went into your room while Selena was left alone with her cat in the livng room. Your sister scowled at you as you walked back to your room. "My shows are dumb, huh?" Her eyes started to glow a bright pink as she grabbed the remote. "Let's see how much you like your stupid cartoons when you get a closer look..."

======================================================

A little while later, you heard a knock on your door. When you opened it, Selena was standing in front of it with the tv remote in her outstretched hand. "Here you go, big brother!", she said cheerfully. "I'm done with the tv, so you can have a turn now."

"Uh... thanks?"

Selena nodded and pranced over to her room... or at least she began to before you walked into the living room. Once you got there, she peeked out from behind the corner. And watched as you turned the TV on... and vanished in a small burst of light! Selena jumped out from the hallway and laughed as her big brother had disappeared! "It worked! Now my dumb nerdy brother's gone! And he's never getting out!"

"Mew!"

"Huh? Don't be silly, kitty!", Selena said as if she could understand her pet. "The only way he's coming back is if he flips the channel to something i like... and he's way too stubborn to do that!"

Meanwhile, you were shocked and confused as your surroundings suddenly changed and you fell on your butt!
1.title: Beginning

112.content:
"Where am I?"You think as you slowly begin to stand up in your new pitch black enviorment. "Hello!"You scream into the black abyss as you wander areound hoping to find a wall or a light or something. As you continue to wander around you begin to hear some music playing softly, "Five o'clock get a call to go bladding......"You faintly hear the singer sing. "Why does that sound familiar?"You think as you continue to try to find something to brighten up the area.

"But my mom says I got to prevent......"The song continues as you walk through the void getting a litle louder with each passing moment. You could have sworn you have heard that song before but you couldn't place it. As the song grows louder you see a little bead of light infront of you, "That's gotta be a way outta here."You think as you beging to book it toward the small light source. "Welcome to my life as a....."You can still hear the song playing as you race toward what you hoped was your freedom, the small source of light getting bigger and bigger as you approached it. "The story of my life as a....."That's when it hit you what the song was, it was a theme from a old cartoon your cousin had shown you.......but why was someone playing it in a pitch black room?

You decided you would figure that out later as you continue to run toward the light source as the song ends, "My teenage robot.......life." Right as the final note ends a giant yet all to familiar sign appears right in front of you that reads "My Life as Teenage Robot." It had the exact same font and style of the show, "What's going on?!"You yell freaking out a bit as the light source you had been running toward engulfs the room blinding you.

As your vision slowly clears you can barely make out that you are in.........
112.title: MLAATR

choices: Star vs the Forces of Evil
12.title: Disney cartoon

1251.content:
"Where am I?"You ask yourself rubbing your head a little as you get up to survey your surroundings , it looked like you were in a forest or woods of some kind. "How did I get outside?"You were just inside your living room a few moments ago and as far as you could remember you never left the house. That's when you remembered, "Selena" That little brat must have done something to you. "When I get my hands on her, but first I gotta figure out where I am."

You desperately begin to look around trying your best to find a road, a sign, really anything to let you know where you were. "Come on there's gotta be something, some sort of clue."You think before noticing what looked like a wooden sign. "Bingo!"You slowly approach the sign before seeing something you never in a thousand years thought you would see..........the sign read "Gravity Falls." "But.....but that's.....that's a cartoon."You were beginning to freak, how on earth could this be real? Before you even had a chance to try and process the new information a rustling sound could be heard from infront of you.......and it was moving closer.

"Who.....Who's there!?"You scream backing up against a nearby tree. A figure slowly emerges from the bushes.........
1251.title: Gravity Falls

choices: The Life and Times of Juniper Lee
13.title: CartoonNetwork Cartoon

choices: Your beaker is dropped and breaks, reducing you to a puddle on the floor.
133.content:
You suddenly find yourself in a black space, with some sort of text scrolling up. You yelped as you were yanked up by it and fell, bumping your head and tumbling down the ascending letters. You finally got caught on one of the letters and hung up there for a bit. "Wh-what's happening?!", you scream out to yourself. Suddenly, the letters disappear, causing you to drop straight down! You cry out as you rapidly descend, thinking that you'll soon be splattered all over the ground of... wherever this was! As if fate was looking out for you (or possibly a mischievous little devil), a clean, metallic surface suddenly materializes beneath you as you plummet, your fall being broken as you're tightly squeezed into a medium-sized beaker on a hot plate.

You immediately feel the heat as it quickly gets to work melting your malleable body. "I would have been better off if I splatted...", you whimpered as you were soon reduced to nothing but a liquid, with only your eyes floating inside.

As you sit there, you notice a red-haired boy pass you by before turning back. "Hello?", he said as he looked closely at the strange goop in front of him. "I do not recognize this... whatever it is..." He spoke in an odd accent and wore a thick pair of glasses, gloves, and a labcoat. You weren't sure where you recognized him from (though, you would have if you had payed attention to the show's opening). Your eyes blinked as Dexter grabbed your beaker and shook you around, quickly disorienting you. As your eyes spun around from dizziness, he looked on in amazement. "Whatever this is, it is clearly alive! I should study this specimen further..."

Your ears stung at the words "study". Your cousin had already done plenty of studying and experimentation on you. To say the idea of someone else poking and prodding examining you made you uneasy was an understatement. You were melted, contained, in a strange place, and being held by a strange boy. You were scared out of your mind.
133.title: Dexter's Lab

135.content: here are some more choices
135.title: other choices

14.content: which world will you end up in now?
14.title: Not the Big Three

choices: Bart stuffs you down his shorts and takes you home.
Decides to see what you taste like.
141.content:
You suddenly saw a bright yellow ring speeding toward you with letters surrounding it and a background of clouds until everything went so bright that you covered your eyes. When you opened them up, you were greeted by the sight of a skateboard quickly descending! You didn't even have a chance to scream before you were completely flattened by the weight, the skateboard's movements dragging you behind and causing your malleable body to get caught under the wheels, wrapping around them as whoever was riding continued rolling along. "What the hell? There's something on my wheels", said a boyish voice before he stopped and lifted his skateboard up, seeing a pinkish-brown sludge stuck to the wheels. "Gross! How am I supposed to get this gunk off?" The "gunk" slowly began to move and an eye emerged and blinked. "Aaaah!" The boy dropped his skateboard and stepped back, more curious than afraid.

Before you dropped to the ground, you were able to get a glimpse of the kid that had landed on you. He was wearing a orange shirt and a pair of blue shorts. His skin was an odd yellow color, and his hair seemed to blend in with it and had nine spikes on his head. ...Bart Simpson? But he was a cartoon character. There must have been some kind of mistake. Maybe you could figure it out if you could reform. You began to ooze out from underneath the skateboard, managing to get into a sort of blob shape... before Bart's hand suddenly reached down and grabbed you, squishing you in his grip!

"Cool! This thing's alive!" The yellow boy squeezed you in his hand and released, laughing as your eyes would bulge out with each crushing motion. "Man, you must've come from the power plant", Bart said as he stretched you in his hands. "Wonder what kinda stuff a little gooey dude like you can do."

You were mentally panicking right now. If you could just reform, you might be able to get some help, but Bart just saw you as some kind of weird creature to play with, and it didn't look like he had any intention of leaving you alone. What was he going to do to you?
141.title: Theeee Siiiiiimmmpsooooooons

info.brief_description: Wonder how little Jack will do in theses new worlds
info.description:
You are nine year-old Jack Harper. You were born with a squishy, goo-like body. While this makes you practically immortal, it also means you are extremely weak, constantly getting squashed and flattened by almost everything. You seem to be able to take an awful lot of punishment. Getting smooshed doesn't really hurt you. In fact, you could be melted into a puddle and still be fine. You still hate it nonetheless. You're kind of a geek, often studying on the internet and playing video games. You seem to have stopped aging.
Although you are unusual compared to other people, you're just one of many abnormalities in this world.......but what about in others?

Well thanks to a remote you found in your room and your little sister's evil schemes you're getting your chance to find out.

Play as Jack as you travel from series to series trying desperately to get back to your world.

=============================================================================================================

Rules:

No one sentence chapters

Jack can't die, period end of story

No copying other people's works, if I see it I will remove it

If a there's a sudden development that doesn't make any damn sense, or if a chapter is nothing but a sentence long, I will delete the chapter without hesitation. HOWEVER if it's clear that some effort is put into it, I'll simply email you before going over and fixing grammatical or continuity errors

Gas/Toilet stuff is alright so long as it's not too heavy

Besides these rules everything else is fair game within reason.

=============================================================================================================

And don't forget to visit Derpus' profile, https://www.writing.com/main/portfolio/view/derpatron, to read more about this little fella and his crazy antics. Trust me when I say you are missing out if you don't, and a major thank you to him for writing the first chapter.
info.pretty_title: Squishy boy in a Cartoon world
